metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9658 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Checkstyle before 8.18 loads external DTDs by default.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

checkstyle - 8.26-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: checkstyle package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.26-1').
